Articles.Content: I love the Kerbal Space Program since I get a rush out of firing massive titan-size rockets into the sky! I also plan to learn coding languages such as C# and C++ through making mods for this amazing game.

Welcome to the KSP forums!

Happy launching!

Arrr...

Captain Millst0ne

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you don\'t fail as much as me!

JupiterII

I love the Kerbal Space Program since I get a rush out of firing massive titan-size rockets into the sky! I also plan to learn coding languages such as C# and C++ through making mods for this amazing game.

Actually, you don\'t even need to know those to make add-on parts! All you need to know is how to make meshes and textures using your favored 3D modelling program. (Probably some other stuff, but that\'s all I know.)
